ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,Charlie Rodrigues,Vic Martin,Bill Ward,John Severin,Don Orehek
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Charlie Rodrigues,Vic Martin,Bill Ward,John Severin,Don Orehek
ComicInfo.Title: E.S.P.; New Celebrity Guitars; The Cracked Annual Achievement Awards; Footboxhockbasetennbasketgolfpoly; A Cracked Look at the Beach; What to Do Until the TV Repairman Arrives; The Awakening...; The World's First Psychedelic Janitor; How the Airlines Can Save Money!; Inflatable Guard; Escape from the Boredom of the Apes
ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrities seen with guitars of unusual shapes. Muhammed Ali, given a guitar shaped like a watermelon complains, "Another lousy watermelon joke?"
How to play a sport which combines virtually every other sport.
After seeing the state of the world a newborn chick returns to its egg.
The guard leaves an inflatable dummy of himself on display to fool Hudd and Dini.
